o:MethodTargetItem.a:Name: mdde_BusinessRule_EditDefaultExample
o:MethodTargetItem.a:Creator: WesselsH1
o:MethodTargetItem.a:MethodScript:
Sub %Method%(obj)
' Create a new selection object for the source objects. Dim objExampleSelection : Set objExampleSelection = obj.Model.CreateSelection
' Add all source objects of the current mapping to the selection. Dim objExample For Each objExample In obj.GetExtendedCollection("mdde_BusinessRule_Examples") objExampleSelection.Objects.Add objExample Next
' Show the object picker and fetch the selected source object. Dim selExampleObj : Set selExampleObj = objExampleSelection.ShowObjectPicker("", "", "Select an example", True, True, False) ' Cleanup the selection object. objExampleSelection.Delete()
' If a source object was selected, go on. If Not(selExampleObj Is Nothing) Then obj.SetExtendedAttribute "mdde_BusinessRule_DefaultExample", selExampleObj End If
End Sub
